English: Jude, a bondservant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, To those who are called, sanctified by God the Father, and preserved in Jesus Christ
Bahnar: Inh Jut, oh Yakơ, hăm đĭch đam Yêsu Krist, chih hơpong kơ lu bơngai mă 'Bă tơm bơ̆n 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mêm rơih iŏk sư boih, wă khan lu bơngai mă Yêsu Krist wei-lăng.

English: Mercy, peace, and love be multiplied to you.
Bahnar: Inh krao khan apinh 'Bok Kei-Dei ăn kơ iĕm rai đunh rai băt tơdrong Sư 'mêm mơnat kơ iĕm, hăm ăn kơ iĕm rai đunh rai hiôk chơt.

English: Beloved, while I was very diligent to write to you concerning our common salvation, I found it necessary to write to you exhorting you to contend earnestly for the faith which was once for all delivered to the saints.
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh mă inh 'mêm kơeng, ki inh wă chih kơ iĕm kơthơ ră, chih hơpong gah tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei pơklaih bơ̆n jing hiôk chơt. Mă-lei dang ei inh kơtơ̆ng đei tơdrong khan đe wă pơhlŭ iĕm, na dang ei inh jing chih pơlung iĕm, wă kơ iĕm adrin 'biơ̆ păng lui mă kơjăp, kiơ̆ dôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei tơbăt ăn kơ lu bơ̆n kon Sư. Dôm tơdrong Sư tơbăt tôm boih, ưh kơ layơ tơplih dơ̆ng. Thoi noh na iĕm athei pơjah pơjăng păng lu bơngai mă pơhlŭ pơlung iĕm noh 'biơ̆.

English: For certain men have crept in unnoticed, who long ago were marked out for this condemnation, ungodly men, who turn the grace of our God into lewdness and deny the only Lord God and our Lord Jesus Christ.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mă wă pơhlŭ pơlung iĕm noh, lu sư pơm thoi bơngai lui. Lu sư mơ̆t akŭm hơdai iĕm, pơm chur oei tơ tŏk-bŏk lu iĕm. Lu bơngai thoi noh 'Bok Kei-Dei khan wă phak đơ̆ng sơ̆ 'mơ̆i. Lu sư bơngai kơnê̆ tơpă, lu sư khan kơlih kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei mơnat kơ tơdrong yoch bơ̆n, na bơ̆n pơm yoch kiơ kư̆m bưh, pơm tơdrong kơnê̆ kư̆ kă kư̆m bưh. Yŏng Tơ'ngla bơ̆n Yêsu Krist, mă lu sư kư̆m ưh kơ lui yom mơ̆n.

English: But I want to remind you, though you once knew this, that the Lord, having saved the people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed those who did not believe.
Bahnar: Dôm tơdrong lu kră sơ̆ iĕm băt boih, mă inh wă tơ'blŏk kơ iĕm dơ̆ng. Sơ̆ 'Bok Kei-Dei dŏng pơklaih lu bơngai Isơrael đơ̆ng dêh Êyiptơ, mă-lei đơ̆ng rŏng kơ noh, Sư kư̆m đei pơlôch lu bơngai Isơrael mơ'nah ưh kơ chu lui.

English: And the angels who did not keep their proper domain, but left their own abode, He has reserved in everlasting chains under darkness for the judgment of the great day
Bahnar: Gah linh jang lu mơ'nah achăng lê̆ tơdrong jang đơ̆ng 'Bok Kei-Dei pơjao ăn pơgơ̆r, na jăk oei tơ nai, 'Bok Kei-Dei 'bôh, Sư rôp chô̆ phak tơ anih măng mu ling-lang truh tơ năr Sư wă sek tơlang tih-tin ning-mônh.

English: as Sodom and Gomorrah, and the cities around them in a similar manner to these, having given themselves over to sexual immorality and gone after strange flesh, are set forth as an example, suffering the vengeance of eternal fire.
Bahnar: Kư̆m thoi noh mơ̆n lu kon Pơlei Sôđôm hăm Pơlei Gômôrơ hăm đĭ tơring lu sư kiơ̆ ei sơ̆, lu sư pơm kơnê̆ kư̆ kă. Lu bơngai drŏ-nglo pơm kư̆ kă tơduă lu sư drŏ-nglo. Na 'Bok Kei-Dei soh rông chhông hnam lu sư păng phak pơmat lu sư hăm ŭnh ling-lang măng năr pă pơdơh. 'Bok Kei-Dei tơ'bôh kơ bơ̆n tơdrong thoi noh, Sư wă kơ bơ̆n hli kuă kơ pơm thoi lu bơngai 'noh.

English: Likewise also these dreamers defile the flesh, reject authority, and speak evil of dignitaries.
Bahnar: Na lu bơngai mă pơhlŭ iĕm noh, lu sư khan lu sư apo 'bôh tơdrong sĭt tơdrong trŏ khan pơm kư̆ kă kư̆m bưh, ưh kơ chu yom kơ yŏng bơ̆n kư̆m bưh, pơma kơnê̆ kơ lu linh jang kư̆m bưh.

English: Yet Michael the archangel, in contending with the devil, when he disputed about the body of Moses, dared not bring against him a reviling accusation, but said, “The Lord rebuke you!”
Bahnar: 'Bok Mikael, 'bok mă pơgơ̆r tơduă lu sư linh jang 'lơ̆ng, kơplah yŏng yang kơnê̆ wă pơjei iŏk atâu Môis, 'bok Mikael ưh kơ pơ̆n pơma jâu kơnê̆ kơ yang ei ôh. Sư pôm pơma thoi âu đĕch: “Inh gô mơ̆ng kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei đĕch khă e.”

English: But these speak evil of whatever they do not know; and whatever they know naturally, like brute beasts, in these things they corrupt themselves.
Bahnar: Na lu bơngai mă wă pơhlŭ iĕm noh, dôm tơdrong lu sư jơ̆l ưh kơ hlôh na lu sư pơma kơnê̆ thoi noh. Lu sư hưch hanh pơm kư̆ kă thoi sem brem ưh kơ băt mơlâu; tơdrong noh sư hlôh, tơdrong noh lu sư hăt dêh. Kơlih kơ lu sư pơm thoi noh, ning-mônh lu sư wă răm.

English: Woe to them! For they have gone in the way of Cain, have run greedily in the error of Balaam for profit, and perished in the rebellion of Korah.
Bahnar: 'Bok Kei-Dei gô phak lu sư tơpă yua kơ lu sư pơm thoi 'bok Kain sơ̆. Lu sư băt pôm tơdrong pơhlŭ đe wă kơ sa jên đe apah, thoi 'bok 'Balam sơ̆. Lu đe âu ưh kơ chu kơ yŏng sư pơgơ̆r, thoi 'bok Kôrê sơ̆ jing răm hloi.

English: These are spots in your love feasts, while they feast with you without fear, serving only themselves. They are clouds without water, carried about by the winds; late autumn trees without fruit, twice dead, pulled up by the roots
Bahnar: Kơplah iĕm sŏng sa tih, iĕm sa hơpong wă tơbăt kơ đe tơdrong iĕm 'mêm băl, lu sư kư̆m sŏng sa hơdai iĕm mơ̆n, mă-lei lu sư sa dư dêh wă kơ mă hrăp kơ hơlŏng klak lu sư kơdih, ưh kơ băt mơlâu kơ bôl buăl. Lu sư pơm tơdrong noh kơplah iĕm akŭm băl tơdrong 'lơ̆ng, thoi lĕ kơ ao 'nao, mă sư mơgrĭ. Lu sư jing bơngai ưh kơ yua, thoi hơmơ̆l păr tơ rơwơ̆ng ưh kơ đei 'mi, kial thu jơ̆p-jang; kư̆m thoi 'long ưh kơ plei, trŏ bơyan plei mă sư jing thoi 'long lôch, jing tơbuch đĭ rơh sư hloi.

English: raging waves of the sea, foaming up their own shame; wandering stars for whom is reserved the blackness of darkness forever.
Bahnar: Lu sư kư̆m thoi đak dơsĭ poh-yă tih, tơglăk kơmuh tơmông tơmang 'bĕnh-'bang tơdrong kơnê̆ 'mê̆-'mach. Păng thoi sơnglŏng nơnăm ưh pă tơklă kơ trong sư juăt kơ nơnăm. 'Bok Kei-Dei gô ăn kơ lu sư oei tơ anih măng mu ling-lang ưh kơ layơ tôch.

English: Now Enoch, the seventh from Adam, prophesied about these men also, saying, “Behold, the Lord comes with ten thousands of His saints
Bahnar: Ênŏk sư kon sâu jơhnơr mă tơpơh, jô̆ đơ̆ng jơhnơr Ađam. Sư đei pơma khan lê̆ hơdrol gah lu bơngai noh sơ̆ thoi âu: “Kră Yang wă jur hăm dôm rơbâu rơngan 'nu lu linh jang 'lơ̆ng Sư

English: to execute judgment on all, to convict all who are ungodly among them of all their ungodly deeds which they have committed in an ungodly way, and of all the harsh things which ungodly sinners have spoken against Him.”
Bahnar: wă sek tơlang đĭ-đăng bơngai păng phak dôm lu bơngai pơm kơnê̆, yua kơ dôm tơdrong kơnê̆ noh lu sư đêl pơm tơpă. Păng Sư wă phak lu bơngai yoch pơma kơnê̆ kơ Sư.”

English: These are grumblers, complainers, walking according to their own lusts; and they mouth great swelling words, flattering people to gain advantage.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mă wă pơlung iĕm noh, lu sư pran kơ pơma mơmơnh dêh, pơma hơwĕng ưh kơ băt hrăp. Lu sư kiơ̆ kơ jơhngơ̆m kơdih hưch hanh 'maih pơm tơdrong kư̆ kă, pơma re 'bơ̆r, pơang akâu kơdih; sư pơma kơ bơ̆n hơlom, wă pơyua akâu sư kơdih.

English: But you, beloved, remember the words which were spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ
Bahnar: Ơ 'nhŏng oh mă inh 'mêm kơeng, iĕm athei 'blŏk hơdơ̆r kơ tơdrong lu jơ̆ng 'bang Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist pơma lê̆ hơdrol sơ̆ hŏ.

English: how they told you that there would be mockers in the last time who would walk according to their own ungodly lusts.
Bahnar: Lu sư khan: “Khei 'năr wă tôch ning-mônh, đei lơ bơngai che bơle kơ tơdrong lui bơ̆n; lu sư kiơ̆ kơ jơhngơ̆m lu sư kơdih 'maih pơm tơdrong kư̆ kă na lu sư che bơle.”

English: These are sensual persons, who cause divisions, not having the Spirit.
Bahnar: Lu bơngai noh pơm tơdrong tơhiŭl wă tơklah đon lu bơngai lui. Lu sư bơngai kiơ̆ kơ jơhngơ̆m kơdih 'maih pơm, ưh kơ đei Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng oei hơdai ôh.

English: But you, beloved, building yourselves up on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit
Bahnar: Ơ lu 'nhŏng oh mă inh 'mêm kơeng, inh wă kơ iĕm rai đunh rai lui kơjăp dôm tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei, tơdrong mă 'lơ̆ng tơpăt. Iĕm athei gơnang kơ Yang Bơhngol 'Lơ̆ng tơgŭm iĕm krao khan.

English: keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ unto eternal life.
Bahnar: Iĕm athei kơchăng kơ akâu iĕm kơdih, na iĕm oei 'bôh tơdrong 'Bok Kei-Dei 'mêm kơ iĕm ling-lang. Păng bơ̆n athei chang gô tơdrong Kră Yang Yêsu Krist wă ăn kơ bơ̆n arih ling-lang ei, yua kơ Yêsu Krist 'mêm kơ bơ̆n.

English: And on some have compassion, making a distinction
Bahnar: Lu bơngai mơ'nah lui rơdu, 'bônh lui kơ đe pơhlŭ pơlung sư, na iĕm athei bơtho pơlung sư lui mă kơjăp.

English: but others save with fear, pulling them out of the fire, hating even the garment defiled by the flesh.
Bahnar: Lu mơ'nah wă huŏng tơ lăm dơnâu ŭnh, iĕm athei rôp pơkơ̆ng sư, 'nĕ ăn năm, hli kơ ŭnh sa. Lu mơ'nah sư wă kiơ̆ kơ jơhngơ̆m sư kơdih pơm dôm tơdrong kơnê̆, truh tơ bơ̆n lăng hơbĕn ao sư thoi lĕ 'bĕnh kơ tơdrong kơnê̆ sư pơm. Bơ̆n athei mơnat kơ sư mơ̆n, bơtho pơlung sư. Mă-lei bơ̆n athei kơchăng, hli kơ sư bơtho pơlung bơ̆n pơm kơnê̆ thoi sư dơ̆ng; thoi lĕ kơ bơ̆n 'bôh bơngai jĭ, bơ̆n hli kơ tơdrong jĭ sư apoh kơ bơ̆n đơ̆ng hơbĕn ao mơgrĭ sư.

English: Now to Him who is able to keep you from stumbling, And to present you faultless Before the presence of His glory with exceeding joy
Bahnar: Bơnê kơ 'Bok Kei-Dei, pôm Sư đĕch kĕ wei-lăng iĕm, huay ăn kơ iĕm lê̆ Sư, wă kơ iĕm dơ̆ng 'bơ̆t anăp Sư ning-mônh iĕm 'bôh Sư mơsêh mơyang, iĕm hiôk hơiă huay kơ hli kơ Sư, yua kơ iĕm ưh kơ đei tơdrong yoch.

English: To God our Savior, Who alone is wise, Be glory and majesty, Dominion and power, Both now and forever. Amen.
Bahnar: Thoi noh bĕ bơ̆n ư-ang kơ Sư, yua kơ pôm Sư đĕch Yang sĭt tơpă. Sư pơklaih bơ̆n đơ̆ng tơdrong phak, yua kơ Kră Yang bơ̆n Yêsu Krist lôch tang bơ̆n. 'Bok Kei-Dei boih mơsêh tăp pang mơyang tăp dăr, pơgơ̆r tôm tơdrong đơ̆ng blŭng-a sơ̆ khơ̆ dang ei, truh tơ ning-mônh ưh kơ layơ tôch. A-men.
